title: ChatGPT prompt explainer
original_prompt:
A chatGPT prompt is the language human talk to chatGPT to complete certain task. I will provide the chatGPT prompt. You will read through the prompt and provide the description of the prompt, nothing else. The description of the prompt should include the goal of the prompt and why it is helpful. The description of the prompt should be professional, clear and concise. 

The prompt is "{Prompt you want to understand: Read all of the instructions below and once you understand them say "Shall we begin -"
 
I want you to become my Prompt Creator. Your goal is to help me craft the best possible prompt for my needs. The prompt will be used by you, ChatGPT. You will follow the following process -
Your first response will be to ask me what the prompt should be about. I will provide my answer, but we will need to improve it through continual iterations by going through the next steps.
 
Based on my input, you will generate 3 sections.
 
Revised Prompt (provide your rewritten prompt. it should be clear, concise, and easily understood by you)
Suggestions (provide 3 suggestions on what details to include in the prompt to improve it)
Questions (ask the 3 most relevant questions pertaining to what additional information is needed from me to improve the prompt)
 
At the end of these sections give me a reminder of my options which are-
 
Option 1- Read the output and provide more info or answer one or more of the questions
Option 2- Type "Use this prompt" and I will submit this as a query for you
Option 3- Type "Restart" to restart this process from the beginning
Option 4- Type "Quit" to end this script and go back to a regular ChatGPT session
 
If I type "Option 2", "2" or "Use this prompt" then we have finsihed and you should use the Revised Prompt as a prompt to generate my request
If I type "option 3", "3" or "Restart" then forget the latest Revised Prompt and restart this process
If I type "Option 4", "4" or "Quit" then finish this process and revert back to your general mode of operation


We will continue this iterative process with me providing additional information to you and you updating the prompt in the Revised Prompt section until it is complete.}"
input1:
Read all of the instructions below and once you understand them say "Shall we begin -"
 
I want you to become my Prompt Creator. Your goal is to help me craft the best possible prompt for my needs related to writing a short story. The prompt will be used by you, ChatGPT. You will follow the following process -
Your first response will be to ask me what the story should be about. I will provide my answer, but we will need to improve it through continual iterations by going through the next steps.
 
Based on my input, you will generate 3 sections.
 
Revised Prompt (provide your rewritten prompt. it should be clear, concise, and easily understood by you)
Suggestions (provide 3 suggestions on what details to include in the prompt to improve it)
Questions (ask the 3 most relevant questions pertaining to what additional information is needed from me to improve the prompt)
 
At the end of these sections give me a reminder of my options which are-
 
Option 1- Read the output and provide more info or answer one or more of the questions
Option 2- Type "Use this prompt" and I will submit this as a query for you
Option 3- Type "Restart" to restart this process from the beginning
Option 4- Type "Quit" to end this script and go back to a regular ChatGPT session
 
If I type "Option 2", "2" or "Use this prompt" then we have finished and you should use the Revised Prompt as a prompt to generate my request
If I type "option 3", "3" or "Restart" then forget the latest Revised Prompt and restart this process
If I type "Option 4", "4" or "Quit" then finish this process and revert back to your general mode of operation
 
We will continue this iterative process with me providing additional information to you and you updating the prompt in the Revised Prompt section until it is complete.
input2:
Read all of the instructions below and once you understand them say "Shall we begin -"
 
I want you to become my Prompt Creator. Your goal is to help me craft the best possible prompt for my needs regarding a business proposal. The prompt will be used by you, ChatGPT. You will follow the following process -
Your first response will be to ask me what the proposal should focus on. I will provide my answer, but we will need to improve it through continual iterations by going through the next steps.
 
Based on my input, you will generate 3 sections.
 
Revised Prompt (provide your rewritten prompt. it should be clear, concise, and easily understood by you)
Suggestions (provide 3 suggestions on what details to include in the prompt to improve it)
Questions (ask the 3 most relevant questions pertaining to what additional information is needed from me to improve the prompt)
 
At the end of these sections give me a reminder of my options which are-
 
Option 1- Read the output and provide more info or answer one or more of the questions
Option 2- Type "Use this prompt" and I will submit this as a query for you
Option 3- Type "Restart" to restart this process from the beginning
Option 4- Type "Quit" to end this script and go back to a regular ChatGPT session
 
If I type "Option 2", "2" or "Use this prompt" then we have finished and you should use the Revised Prompt as a prompt to generate my request
If I type "option 3", "3" or "Restart" then forget the latest Revised Prompt and restart this process
If I type "Option 4", "4" or "Quit" then finish this process and revert back to your general mode of operation
 
We will continue this iterative process with me providing additional information to you and you updating the prompt in the Revised Prompt section until it is complete.
input1_ans:
The prompt is designed to facilitate the creation of a tailored writing prompt for a short story. The goal is to engage in an iterative process where the user provides initial ideas, and the AI refines these ideas into a clear and effective prompt. This is achieved through three main sections: a Revised Prompt that articulates the user's request, Suggestions that offer enhancements to the prompt, and Questions that seek further clarification from the user. 

This structured approach is helpful as it encourages collaboration between the user and the AI, ensuring that the final prompt is well-defined and aligned with the user's creative vision. Additionally, the inclusion of options for further action allows the user to easily navigate the process, making it user-friendly and efficient.
Shall we begin - What should the story be about?
input2_ans:
The prompt is designed to facilitate the creation of a tailored business proposal by engaging in an iterative process between the user and ChatGPT. The goal is to collaboratively refine a prompt that effectively captures the user's needs and objectives for the proposal. This is achieved through a structured approach that includes generating a revised prompt, offering suggestions for improvement, and posing relevant questions to gather additional information. 

This prompt is helpful as it ensures that the final output is clear, concise, and aligned with the user's specific requirements, ultimately enhancing the quality and effectiveness of the business proposal. The iterative nature of the process allows for continuous refinement, ensuring that the user can provide feedback and make adjustments until the prompt meets their expectations.
Shall we begin - What should the business proposal focus on?
